cars.description: Pretty rough shape, but it has power windows and there's a 12 disc changer in the back, so party on Wayne.
Not too shabby, the 'Check Electrical System' alarm likes to go off, but it's nothing to worry about.
Briefly owned, but in perfect condition.  Not really sure why the VIN number's scratched out.
